test-case.name: fn-has-children-001
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "has-children" function with arity zero.

modified.change: Context-dependent functions can now be referenced without error.

test-case.name: fn-has-children-002
test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "has-children" function with arity one.

test-case.description: Attempts to evaluate the "has-children" function with two arguments.

test-case.description: Attempts to reference the "has-children" function with arity two.

test-case.description: Evaluates the zero-arity "has-children" function with absent context item.

test-case.description: Evaluates the (arity one) "has-children" function with absent context item.
